caption.p: a– d TEM image of Co-N 4/NC (inset: SAED pattern) and elemental mapping of Co, N, and C. e HR-TEM (bright field). f Aberration-corrected HAADF-TEM image. Enlarged pattern of Co-N 4/NC and partial single Co atoms (yellow). g EELS atomic spectra of Co, N, and C elements corresponding to f. h– k TEM image of Fe-N 4/NC (inset: SAED pattern) and elemental mapping of Fe, N, and C. o HR-TEM (bright field). p Aberration-corrected HAADF-TEM image of Fe-N 4/NC and partial single Fe atoms (red). q EELS atomic spectra of Fe, N, and C elements corresponding to p
